comments.body: Not sure if it is covered in detail elsewhere in the onboarding docs... but if not, it would be good to highlight that `tsc-agenda` should be used sparingly and only if the issue cannot be resolved through normal discourse.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +23,27 @@* `meta` - For issues whose topic is governance, policies, procedures, etc.
* `tsc-agenda` - Open issues and pull requests with this label will be added to
  the Technical Steering Committee meeting agenda

--
